lender.name: Sig
lender.loan_because: Everyone should give

lender.name: Edith & Petter
lender.loan_because: One Brazilian One Norwegian For the moment living in Nepal..

lender.name: gagliajn
lender.loan_because: "stone soup" can feed the world!
lender.occupational_info: I teach English and US Citizenship.

lender.name: Trog
lender.loan_because: Proverbs 14:31 (NIV) 31 He who oppresses the poor shows contempt for their Maker, but whoever is kind to the needy honors God.

lender.name: Erik
lender.loan_because: I started with a gift certificate and enjoy giving to people with like interests to myself. It is a great way to help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work construction and build residential homes.

lender.name: Klassen Family
lender.loan_because: we have enough and we want to share.

lender.name: Clayton
lender.loan_because: Success should be available to those who are willing to work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I help buildings consume energy more efficiently.

lender.name: Tore
lender.loan_because: Fun to see what other people around the world do. And for me it is fairly cheap to give someone an oppurtunity. I guess it all makes me feel good.
lender.occupational_info: I make software, I make the computers do what they do

lender.name: Abundance for All
lender.loan_because: God has given us many blessings and we want to share them.

lender.name: Kris
lender.loan_because: at the end of a week, when i sit down, sip my coffee and reflect on what was going on, the storys and messages on the kiva website help me answer the one question that matters =)

lender.name: Michael & Barry
lender.loan_because: We are so lucky & others are not so lucky
lender.occupational_info: Michael is a Foot Doctor, Barry used to work for the British Government

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves opportunities

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it can be to change, a life of many at once, to survive threw that change takeing a chance for all.
lender.occupational_info: helping create change, threw people helping people.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I believe the only way for a better world is to help one another.
lender.occupational_info: I design and develop computer programs that help engineers and technicians perform their work faster and better.

lender.name: Lynn Harrison
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by the strength and courage of the entrepreneurs, and would like to support them as they improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who writes songs, sings and plays guitar for people in my community. Also, I do some writing work for local businesses, helping them advertise to reach more customers.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.occupation: Executive Director of Low Income Housing

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: It is a gift that keeps on giving
lender.occupational_info: I help people print color accurately

lender.name: Bård
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: This action reflects what my Mother has always stood for - helping those who are in need.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I work for big business.Kiva makes me feel good!

lender.name: Emile
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. We all need to pay it forward. I happen to be fortunate enough to have the ability to help, even in a small way, it helps.

lender.name: Peter Hjalmarsson
lender.loan_because: I believe in micro loans as a tool to grow and evolve people. I have a special relationship with Kyrghyzstan, so I want to focus on loans there.
lender.occupational_info: I help large multinational companies to run their computer systems more efficiently.

lender.name: Bret
lender.loan_because: Some very special people introduced me to Kiva - thanks! I enjoy making a small difference, even if it is only $25 at a time.

lender.name: Michael & Roxy
lender.loan_because: A very generous friend literally gave us the gift of giving.

lender.name: Mari
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of person to person lending.
lender.occupational_info: As a traffic control person I protect the safety of workers, pedestrians and drivers within construction or accident sites. As a person I try to always put the rest of the world first and help out where I can and with Kiva its easy!

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: Micro-finance, as it has been realized by Kiva.org, is one of the most promising and reliable mechanisms for ending extreme poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a Video Story Producer at Cantaloupe TV (www.cantaloupe.tv). Producing documentary-style short stories for release in a multimedia environment has been my specialty since 2004.

lender.name: Meryl
lender.loan_because: Knowing there is a person who benefits makes lending feel more purposeful and effective.
lender.occupational_info: I teach writing skills, and creative writing in English. Language is both a skill and a tool. Being able to use it effectively can make a difference in people's lives.

lender.name: Phil
lender.occupational_info: I try to help students between the ages of 12-25 know and understand the love of Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: No matter how badly we have it in the U.S., there are people across the globe doing much more with much less.
lender.occupational_info: I help people design and build buildings so that they use less of the world's resources.

lender.name: knownbad
lender.loan_because: we could

lender.name: Jose
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing is so powerful, it simply works!
lender.occupational_info: Trying to make footprints in the sand of time...

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: It's fun!
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired Broadcast engineer so do not work full time any more. But I do spend at least one day each week working as a volunteer in an Oxfam shop which sells secondhand donated goods, mainly books and bric-a-brac. I do it because I get to meet lots of people and its quite good fun!

lender.name: Bob
lender.occupational_info: Retired educator, currently an author of a book "Up Close & Personal: Effective Learning for Students & Teachers" and adjunct professor in the SUNY system.

lender.name: Merijn
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a brilliant and transparent way to have my loan impact small entrepreneurs, over and over again (keep re-investing repaid loans guys!).

lender.name: Sal & Laura
lender.loan_because: I just seemed like a very cool way to help others in a very personal and direct way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a network and facilities manager. My wife Laura is a teacher for 4 and 5 year old children.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: God has given me so much that I am priveledged to be able to share with others
lender.occupational_info: learning to teach young children with impairments how to be their best

lender.name: Daniel Cunningham
lender.loan_because: I think it is an effective way to help people help themselves, and I know it can be hard to get a small or medium loan especially -oddly- when all you need is a small or medium loan.
lender.occupational_info: I help build software, mostly for webservers and application servers.

lender.name: Bryan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people pull themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I should, and I can. If we don't help each other, who will?
lender.occupational_info: I manage orders, mostly from South American companies, for industrial equipment.

lender.name: petriedish
lender.loan_because:
Everyone deserves to be given the opportunity to make a better life for themselves. And I believe that we have the power to give everyone in the world that chance. An entire community of individuals doing “the little things” creates the potential for great change.
Each one of us can “save the world”. And we owe it to ourselves, and our own hearts, to do so.
lender.occupational_info: Freelance web/graphic design for small businesses, design work for charity, aspiring global volunteer

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: I always wanted to be a world traveler. I may not get that chance but my money can. I love the idea of being able to help hard-working individuals lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Donna
lender.occupational_info: I enable acceleration of businesses and careers.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: this world needs a good dose of hope through economic justice and opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I get to lead worship services, preach, teach Bible classes, and be with people in the celebrations and struggles life brings

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I believe that offering a way for people to have work brings them self-respect which in turns builds stronger families and communities. It gives people hope for their future. I respect their determination to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: I have a passion for flowers and work as a florist. I also make quilts / blankets for charity. For the sick, for babies in hospital, for people who have had a personal trauma. These are my ways of bringing beauty into someone's life and healing a broken world.

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: i like to help people
lender.occupational_info: i am in 7th grade

lender.name: Facey family
lender.loan_because: W'd like to give the gift of financial freedom which can help bring happiness.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I beleive in self-determination, free enterprise and equal opportunity
lender.occupational_info: I keep the government honest

lender.name: carol
lender.occupational_info: I am a fine art photographer

lender.name: nancy
lender.loan_because: I love to help people! I think that we are all connected in this world in some way and it is our obligation to help others. And we all at some point in our lives need help.

lender.name: Kim & Pradeep
lender.loan_because: because all people deserve to control their own destiny.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in a large hospital in Canada.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: we have been helped in the past
lender.occupational_info: hard but rewarding

lender.name: Lea
lender.loan_because: Someone once gave me a chance and this is my opportunity to pass it along. My goal is to eventually put $5000 into the system that can be lent and then relent, the ultimate in recycling.

lender.name: Marijke
lender.loan_because: it's a wonderful way to reach out to people throughout the world and to learn about their lives and endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: I spent years working as a midwife and now travel to teach midwifery and to support others in creating competency-based midwifery education programs in their countries. I am also a trainer of conflict resolution and mediation skills.

lender.name: Kate and Scuba
lender.loan_because: it feels good and you're helping people fulfil their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I (kate) own a magazine called salt magazine www.saltmagazine.com.au and I also am a freelance photojournalist and run horse riding safaris throughout the world - www.globetrotting.com.au. Scuba is a electrician and a dam good one at that!

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: so many people have helped me in so many ways... i would like to do my part to help others.
lender.occupational_info: i help individuals who have difficulty speaking , either with formulating or pronunciation,due to congenital or developmental deficits.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: To allow people to help themselves and to empower people to achieve what they can
lender.occupational_info: I currently work for a local council in Australia within an Economic Development team

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: we all rise or fall together.

lender.name: sudhir
lender.loan_because: Fortunately, I am can.

lender.name: Cory
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to have the American dream. De Oppresso Liber (Free the Oppressed)
lender.occupational_info: I am an electrician and soldier who loves to work and fight in Afghanistan and Iraq.

lender.name: Indelible Bonobo
lender.loan_because: As an immigrant, I haven't always been fortunate. And back when I used to live in an Eastern European country, life was not easy. Nonetheless, in the end I managed to start a business and significantly improve my prospects. I thoroughly enjoy helping others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I help other businesses safeguard their presence on the tubes :)

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: Helping others is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Organized work intended to advance the social conditions of a community, and especially of the disadvantaged, by providing psychological counseling, guidance, and assistance, especially in the form of social services.

lender.name: Amancia & Amit
lender.occupation: Stay At Home Mom & Network Engineer

lender.name: Connor
lender.loan_because: to give someone else a chance to lead a successful and rewarding life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a middle school student in Montana, USA.

lender.name: Gemma
lender.loan_because: I'd like to share some of what I have with those less fortunate

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: I like helping people with the means to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I answer people's questions. I use books and computers to find what they need. I also like to help people find books to read - so they can learn something new or just enjoy themselves.

lender.name: Nicole&Charles
lender.loan_because: We have been fortunate enough to have many opportunities given to us and everyone deserves an open door every once in a while. All we're tyring to do it open a few doors for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: Nicole works at the CanmetENERGY laboratory for Natural Resources Canada. We are trying to create new technologies that will reduce the environmental impact of the oil sands development in Canada. Charles is a project manager for Parkland County in the Engineering Group.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make the most of their life. What seems like so little to me can mean so much to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children a new language by teaching them all their regular subjects in the new language. Learning in a new language helps to build a global community for the future.

lender.name: Dawn, Matt & Dylan
lender.loan_because: We're grateful to be part of someone's vision becoming reality.

lender.name: Nancie
lender.loan_because: It puts need into perspective.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I believe in the possibility of a world free of extreme poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I study and teach music.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because: I believe a small amount can go a long ways.

lender.name: Clay
lender.loan_because: We need to truly analyze what wealth means in a global setting. Our consumption habits outpace our carrying capacity as a species. We need one another to keep us whole.
lender.occupational_info: I make biodiesel.

lender.name: Adrienne / Stephen
lender.loan_because: we want to help people around the world
lender.occupational_info: adrienne wants to be a writer and stephen wants to be an anthropologist, studying india

lender.name: Susmita
lender.loan_because: Each person above survival can become a bank and loan small sums to uplift and empower women and men from entrenched poverty around the world. Best part is that your one time 'dana' keeps circulating and giving ad infinitum ;) Try it!
lender.occupational_info:
I bring mindful social awareness and understanding where it is most lacking, so 'we the people' can help ourselves
My gratitude to all who nurture and sustain Kiva!

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to be a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies find vendors to support their telecommunication equipment.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: I am a wife and mother of two boys and I know how fortunate I am to have a place to live and food to eat. I want to be part of creating a more equal world for all of us and for our future generations. Plus, I admire people who have their own businesses for the effort they put in daily!! I know it takes a lot of work! :)
lender.occupational_info: Helping fortunate people create the home of their dreams.... so superficial...

lender.name: Natalie & Avery
lender.loan_because: I was introduced to Kiva through a friend. I want to help other female entrepreneurs get ahead in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I own an art studio for young children. During the day, I'm also busy raising my young son.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I can see the difference that I can make to a persons life. A small step for me, a great help to others!!!
lender.occupational_info: IT Consultant Currently a Test Analyst working at a head office in Perth

lender.name: JaleneKanani
lender.loan_because: ...if you give a man a fish he can eat for a day, if you teach him to fish, he can eat for a lifetime...and feed his family, and his village and me when I come to visit...!

lender.name: Hilde
lender.loan_because: I like to see people realize their potential.
lender.occupational_info: I manage an agency that helps immigrants settle in Canada.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Of those to whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have been born and raised in the United States where I have my freedom and opportunities. I just want to give others those same opportunities to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I take a verbatim record using a steno machine and a machine shorthand of court proceedings and then transcribe them into a readable transcript so there is an accurate record of what transpired in court.

lender.name: Stanley
lender.loan_because: "In all things I was an example to you of how, in your lives, you are to give help to the feeble, and keep in memory the words of the Lord Jesus, how he himself said, There is a greater blessing in giving than in getting." Acts 20:35 basic English
lender.occupational_info: I play with time keeping electronics.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world." -Mahatma Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of California, Los Angeles.

lender.name: Gary and Liz
lender.loan_because: God said to Take Care Of Each Other!

lender.name: Pam
lender.loan_because: We all need help getting started. I believe in fair trade ideas and I want people to be free to succeed.

lender.name: Cynthia, Eric & Jason
lender.loan_because: This is one way to help people, and we feel good when we are helping.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I know that any contribution I make will help out someone in need way more than me.
lender.occupational_info: I am an environmental studies graduate, trying to gain skills to help clean up the planet.

lender.name: ION LIFE
lender.loan_because: the entrepreneurs should be given a helping to hand to make a living. We're so fortunate in the west, and become complacent about what we earn and own.
lender.occupational_info: We sell water filters that also alkalize the water. Alkaline water helps the body maintain health.

lender.name: Zora
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help make books. Often I work on cookbooks.

lender.name: Charity
lender.loan_because: "to whom much has been given, much is expected"
lender.occupational_info: I help people pursue their education and ultimately their dreams & passions.

lender.name: Ivar
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to help them self.
lender.occupational_info: Computer programmer

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: My working-class parents struggled to make ends meet and raise five children. I paid for my own education. Now I want to give something back to those who are in similar situations.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English writing and literature to college students. I believe education is very important for everyone.

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: i am committed to elevating humanity through community, arts and culture.

lender.name: Mum 2 Two
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good

lender.name: Åsa
lender.occupation: Work for the trade union in Sweden

lender.name: Atle
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: John Eijmael
lender.loan_because: I believe in this way I can help people around the world with expanding their possibilities and improving their living qualities
lender.occupational_info: Adapting processing to optimise the business of the customer and the standard Dynamics Ax ERp system

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: I care about the world.

lender.name: Carmen, Paul and Ella
lender.loan_because: Wow!! What a fantastic Xmas present. Love the idea of this and can't wait to see what happens now I have completed by first loan. Very very difficult to decide who to lend to but loved reading all the profiles.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: thought it was the best ORIGINAL idea I'd read about in a long time.
lender.occupational_info: I arrange home mortgages for clients and have done for the past 12 years

lender.name: Conlan
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I write applications for mobile phones.

lender.name: Ronny*
lender.loan_because: If I can help a few needing persons to get a better life I am happy to spend some of the little money I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping people in a company with computer problems and make sure they have a working network and email etc.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: Those who have a passion to build a business should have the opportunity. When we were building our business, it was nearly impossible to get a loan. I can appreciate the value of having someone willing to loan money who believes in you1
lender.occupational_info: I am one of four partners who own a company called Nxtbook Media. We create e-publications or virtual publications that can be read similarly to a book or magazine online.

lender.name: Aric Ames
lender.loan_because: Peace and opportunity for all: make it so.

lender.name: Walter
lender.loan_because: it is nice to give someone out there a helpful hand...
lender.occupational_info: I teach college student what calculus is all about :)

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because:
I believe that most of the time people want to take responsibility for making their lives better, but the opportunity isn't always there. Kiva helps me provide that opportunity for others.
I've made my first loan in honor of my boss and friend, Gary, who, aside from my parents, has taught me more about giving in ways small and large than anyone I know.
lender.occupational_info: My paid job involves supporting service-learning programs at higher education institutions in the U.S. states of Nebraska, Iowa, and South Dakota. I am also very interested in exploring and supporting social entrepreneurship and other means to help non-profit organizations move toward sustainability.

lender.name: tabitha
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of entreprenuership.

lender.name: Gaspar
lender.loan_because: It Changes Lives
lender.occupational_info: I love my work 'cause it´s all about helping other people without demanding nothing in return.

lender.name: Vince Curran
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Lars Haakon
lender.occupation: Investment Analyst in Venture Capital firm
